page.title: 03 Village LIfe 1985 (cont)
page.content: There are two pubs in the village called the Red Lion and the Rose and Crown.There is a small factory near the Red Lion which makes shoes.There is a library van that comes round every week.They use the village hall for celebrationss such as V.E.day and for village dances,there is also a Bingo Hall. There are about 700 people living in the village.The people who live in Yardley Hastings do not work on the farms like they did years ago.The nearest main railway station is in Northampton .The buses come through the village every hour of the day on there way to Bedford or Northampton
